description: This file defines the Env class that manages environment variables for the application, including loading environment configs and providing accessors for API settings such as base URL and timeout.

classes.name: Env
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to load environment variables and access configuration settings like API base URL and timeout.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads environment variables from a file, typically called once during app startup. Uses flutter_dotenv to load or merge environment variables.

methods.name: apiBaseUrl
methods.description: Provides the API base URL, with a default fallback. Ensures the URL does not end with a slash for consistency.

methods.name: apiTimeout
methods.description: Returns the API timeout as a Duration, parsing from environment variable or defaulting to 30 seconds. Validates the value.

methods.name: _validate
methods.description: Validates environment variables for correctness, throwing ArgumentError if invalid.
